full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZANG SPYOD SMON LAM GYI 'CHI BSLU BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,('DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I ZHES SOGS KYIS SMON LAM DANG BKRA SHIS BRGYAN PAR BYA, ,BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS 'DUG KYANG, BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA'I 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNY'A NA BADZRA GYI SLOB MA THA SHAL BA DKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS PA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,)
